name: Fruit Pie Frenzy
description:
Use the simple drag and drop controls to place your pie slices into the trays and complete your orders. Nobody wants a mixed pie, so match the colours for bonus points!

Got that one slice that just doesn’t fit? Use the boosters to refresh your slices or destroy a pie completely!

Have fun creating complete fruit pies as you go for the high score and beat your fellow pie makers.


Fruit Pie Frenzy is brought to you by White Hot Games, putting the FUN in Fruit Pie Frenzy :D

Features
Top Score Leaderboard
Achievements
Simple, enjoyable gameplay
Fun, quality graphics
